text:
[Verse]
Woke up feeling light
Sunshine in my sight
Clouds are gone away
It’s a brand new day

[Verse 2]
Walking down the street
Dancing to the beat
Neighbors say hello
Smiles start to grow

[Chorus]
Sunny days are here
No more room for fear
Let’s all cheer and sing
Love is in the spring

[Verse]
Kites up in the sky
Birds so free they fly
Children laugh and play
Happiness all day

[Verse 2]
Picnics in the park
Stay out until dark
Fireflies at night
Glimmer in the light

[Chorus]
Sunny days are here
No more room for fear
Let’s all cheer and sing
Love is in the spring
title: Sunny Days Ahead
